name: Gothitelle
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

attacks.name: Tractorbeam
attacks.effect: Switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to the new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Link Blast
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon and your opponent’s Active Pokémon have the same amount of Energy attached to them, this attack does 80 more damage.
